name: Sparks - Episode One
description:
A cartoon style and happy non-violent arcade racing game. You will drive, slide, enjoy the scenery and have a nice time. Sparks is a casual game with a bright and upbeat graphics and music. You can play it for the racing or you can play it just to relax. Since it isn't violent it is suitable for all audiences. The game has simple controls, good selection of cars and small in number but detailed, varied and spacious tracks to have fun in.

Key Features

  • Small arcade racing game
  • Beautiful and spacious low-poly world
  • Non-violent and family friendly
  • Eight interesting and varied vehicles to choose from
  • Three beautiful and spacious low-poly tracks
  • Play the tracks individually or as a cup
  • Take it light on easy, increase the heat on normal, or feel the competition on hard
  • Nice and uplifting music

You will pick your favorite car, have a nice race, with a good competition, and on a beautiful landscapes.
